about_the_game:
A fast paced dungeon crawler where you embark on quests with one of the the unique six heroes, craft, upgrade, pick spells, upgrade them, combine items and make difficult choices at every step.

Make choices at every step. Will you be lucky? Or peril will be coming your way?




Each turn pick one of the three presented cards, each one giving you unique bonuses or unleashing bad forces upon you. Is it all luck? Or can you strategize?

Play as one of the heroes with unique play styles




Choose one of the six available heroes, with different play styles, strengths and weaknesses.

  • The Iron Guard - a balanced warrior, part of the Iron Guards guild who protects the Iron Fortresses. Strives to balance offensive and defensive spells.
  • The Assassin - a quick and swift outlaw that focuses on speed and landing critical hits out of the shadows.
  • The Pyromancer - a magic wielding hero, trained in the forgotten arts of pyromancy, that bursts enemies down with fire spells
  • The Lich - an undead hero turned good that conjures the powers of ice and necromancy to increase their defense while weakening their enemies.
  • The Paladin - a strong hero, part of the Cult of Light, that smites their enemies with the power of their God of Light.
  • The Druid - the protector of nature, one of the few born with the powers of feeling and understanding nature better than most, whose mission is to protect the natural lands from the Decay, through balancing spellcasting with physical strength.

Other heroes will be added over time.

Quick semi-idle combat. Build up your stats and use spells to overwhelm your foes




Defeat your enemies using a combination of physical attacks and spells. Each hero has its own combat style, and you can also choose different builds to make it more interesting.

The whole world lays unexplored. It's all in the stars.




Collect Relics during your runs and use them to unlock the constellations which will enhance your dungeons with new items, skills and new encounters. After a few hours, your runs will be completely different from when you started.

Keep up with the enemies and the world




You can combine items to create new, more powerful ones, that will give you better odds to reach further. Your enemies become stronger as you progress, so your items should too!

Upgrade your skills or replace them completely




Upgrade your spells to increase their power, or you can swap them out with other skills completely, to shift the focus of your hero from one fight style to another! Defensive or offensive? More debuffs? Better debuffs? More buffes? Healing? Try out multiple builds and reach further in the dungeon.

Are you ready? How far can you reach?

short_description: Quest of the Hero is a fantasy themed dungeon crawler where you embark with one of the heroes in a quest to purify the cursed relics that are plaguing the Kingdom. Defeat enemies, craft powerful items, upgrade your skills and explore unique play styles to get to the end and destroy those relics!
